intro: Hebenstretia stenocarpa, commonly known as the narrow-fruited hebenstretia, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes many shrubs and herbs. The plant is characterized by its simple, opposite leaves and small, white to pale yellow flowers. It produces capsule fruits that contain several seeds. Hebenstretia stenocarpa is often found in rocky or sandy soils and is adapted to arid environments.
